{{cpp/chrono/title|operator&lt;&lt;{{petty|(std::chrono::year_month_day_last)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month_day_last/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                const std::chrono::year_month_day_last&amp; ymdl );
}}

Outputs a textual representation of {{c|ymdl}} into {{c|os}}, as if by

{{cc|os &lt;&lt; std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{}/{:L}"),
                  ymdl.year(), ymdl.month_day_last());}}

where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{}/{:L}")}} is {{c|"{}/{:L}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|char}}, and {{c|L"{}/{:L}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|wchar_t}}.

===Return value===
{{c|os}}
